help.title: We will help you find a worthy specialist
help.paragraph_1: The Baza Skill platform will help you find an experienced specialist in the IT field, as each of our candidates has already completed serious practice at Baza Trainee Ukraine.
help.paragraph_2: Each specialist presented here is skilled in teamwork, has experience in project development with knowledge of requirements, is familiar with difficulties and success at all stages of a project's life.
help.paragraph_3: We give you skilled junior specialists who love what they do. At least that's what they say.

candidates.title: Our candidates
candidates.paragraph_1: Follow the rules for using shared tools
candidates.paragraph_3: Obey the obligation to compile documentation
candidates.paragraph_4: Take well-argued positions in disputes and conflict situations, effectiveness, desire to achieve a common goal
candidates.paragraph_6: They express a position of support for colleagues in the team, readiness to replace a colleague in case of force majeure
candidates.paragraph_9: Unconditionally comply with the legislation, in particular in matters of copyright, personal data protection, GDPR, NDA

footer.support_1: The company sends 10% of profits to support

Error.title: We apologize, but the page you are looking for has been deleted or replaced
